participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and resilient, Liam finds joy in music and values companionship.
participant_1.background: I play music to cheer myself up. I am stuck in a wheelchair. I live with a roommate. I love to listen to music. I was saddened by the death of my favorite horse, but I am grateful for the many years of companionship we shared.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, Maya strives to support her family while pursuing her passions.
participant_2.background: I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery. I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential. I like to create websites. I do my best to support my family and be there for them. My major was American literature and education.

content.text: Hi there, I'm glad to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to create websites and play music.
That's awesome! I enjoy music too.
Me too! What's your favorite band?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorite is probably the Beatles.
Nice! I love them too. They're one of the best bands of all time.
I agree! Do you have any pets?
I used to have a horse, but he died a few years ago.
I'm so sorry to hear that.
It's okay. I'm grateful for the many years of companionship we shared.
That's good to hear. What do you like to do for work?
I'm a web developer.
That's awesome! I'm always impressed by people who can create websites.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun.
What's your favorite part about your job?
I like the challenge of creating something new and seeing it come to life.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're very good at it.
Thanks! I try my best.
